attaque.description: Heal 40 damage from this Pokémon.
Choose 1 of your Pokémon. Search your deck for a card that evolves from that Pokémon and put it onto that Pokémon. (This counts as evolving that Pokémon.) Shuffle your deck afterward.
Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 50 more damage.
Choose 1 of your Pokémon. Search your deck for a card that evolves from that Pokémon and put it onto that Pokémon. (This counts as evolving that Pokémon.) Shuffle your deck afterward.
Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 50 more damage.
Draw a card
Flip 3 coins. This attack does 60 damage times the number of heads
Heal 10 damage from this Pokémon.
During your opponent's next turn, any damage done to this Pokémon by attacks is reduced by 10 (after applying Weakness and Resistance)
Search your deck for a basic Energy card and attach it to 1 of your Benched Pokémon. Shuffle your deck afterward.
During your opponent's next turn, any damage done to this Pokémon by attacks is reduced by 30 (after applying Weakness and Resistance).
Draw a card
Switch this Pokémon with 1 of your Benched Pokémon.
Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Paralyzed.
Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Paralyzed and Poisoned. If tails, the Defending Pokémon is now Confused.
Your opponent switches the Defending Pokémon with 1 of his or her Benched Pokémon.
This Pokémon does 20 damage to itself.
Heal from this Pokémon the same amount of damage you did to the Defending Pokémon.
This Pokémon can't use Sacred Sword during your next turn.
Draw a card
If this Pokémon has any Water Energy attached to it, the Defending Pokémon is now Asleep.
Discard an Energy attached to this Pokémon.
Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 20 more damage.
The Defending Pokémon is now Burned.
Draw a card
If this Pokémon has any Grass Energy attached to it, heal 20 damage from this Pokémon.
Does 10 damage times the number of damage counters on this Pokémon.
Flip 2 coins. If both of them are tails, this Pokémon does 80 damage to itself.
Does 30 damage to one of your oppoent's Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)
Heal 40 damage from this Pokémon. This Pokémon can't retreat during your next turn.
Flip a coin. If heads, prevent all effects of attacks, including damage, done to this Pokémon during your opponent's next turn.
Discard an Energy attached to this Pokémon.
Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Asleep
Heal 60 damage from this Pokémon. This Pokémon is now Asleep.
The Defending Pokémon can't attack during your opponent's next turn.
This attack's damage isn't affected by Resistance.
The Defending Pokémon is now Asleep.
You may do 20 more damage. If you do, this Pokémon does 20 damage to itself.
Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Paralyzed.
Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Paralyzed.
Search your deck for a Lightning Energy card and attach it to this Pokémon. Shuffle your deck afterward
Discard an Energy attached to this Pokémon.
Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Paralyzed.
Flip 3 coins. This attack does 10 damage times the number of heads to each of your opponent's Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)
Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Poisoned.
If the Defending Pokémon is Poisoned, this attack does 60 more damage.
This attack's damage isn't affected by Resistance.
The Defending Pokémon is now Poisoned. Put 2 damage counters instead of 1 on that Pokémon between turns.
Flip 2 coins. This attack does 20 more damage for each heads.
During your opponent's next turn, any damage done to this Pokémon by attacks is reduced by 40 (after applying Weakness and Resistance).
Does 50 damage to 1 of your opponent's Pokémon. This attack's damage isn't affected by Weakness or Resistance.
Flip 2 coins. This attack does 10 damage times the number of heads.
Does 10 more damage for each damage counter on the Defending Pokémon.
The Defending Pokémon is now Asleep.
Flip 2 coins. This attack does 20 damage times the number of heads.
Flip 2 coins. This attack does 20 damage times the number of heads.
The Defending Pokémon is now Confused.
Flip a coin. If heads, discard an Energy attached to 1 of your opponent's Pokémon.
Does 20 more damage for each Psychic Energy attached to this Pokémon.

carte.capacite: As long as this Pokémon is your Active Pokémon, your opponent can't play any Item cards from his or her hand.

attaque.description: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Confused. If tails, discard an Energy attached to the Defending Pokémon.
During your opponent's next turn, if this Pokémon would be damaged by an attack, prevent that attack's damage done to this Pokémon if that damage is 40 or less.
This Pokémon does 10 damage to itself.
If the Defending Pokémon has Fighting Resistance, this attack does 60 more damage.
Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 20 more damage. If tails, this Pokémon does 20 damage to itself.
Discard the top 5 cards of your deck. If any of those cards are Fighting Energy cards, attach them to this Pokémon.
Does 20 more damage for each Fighting Energy attached to this Pokémon.
During your next turn, each of this Pokémon's attacks does 30 more damage (before applying Weakness and Resistance).
Discard an Energy attached to the Defending Pokémon.
Flip a coin. If heads, prevent all effects of attacks, including damage, done to this Pokémon during your opponent's next turn.
Does 10 damage to each of your Benched Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)
Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon can't attack during your opponent's next turn.
Flip 5 coins. This attack does 20 damage times the number of heads. This Pokémon can't attack during your next turn.
Flip a coin. If heads, discard an Energy attached to the Defending Pokémon.
Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 20 more damage. If tails, this Pokémon does 20 damage to itself.

carte.capacite: Once during your turn (before your attack), if this Pokémon is your Active Pokémon, you may flip a coin. If heads, discard an Energy attached to your opponent's Active Pokémon.

attaque.description: Draw a card
This Pokémon can't use Sacred Sword during your next turn.
Flip a coin. If heads, discard a random card from your opponent's hand.
Does 30 damage to 1 of your opponent's Pokémon. This attack's damage isn't affected by Weakness, Resistance, or any other effects on that Pokémon.
If the Defending Pokémon already has any damage counters on it, this attack does 30 more damage.
Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 10 more damage.
Flip 3 coins. This attack does 20 damage times the number of heads.
During your opponent's next turn, any damage done to this Pokémon by attacks is reduced by 30 (after applying Weakness and Resistance).
Flip a coin until you get tails. This attack does 30 damage times the number of heads.
Does 10 more damage for each Darkness Energy attached to all of your Pokémon.
Flip 4 coins. This attack does 10 damage times the number of heads.
Flip 3 coins. This attack does 30 damage times the number of heads.
Switch this Pokémon with 1 of your Benched Pokémon. Then, your opponent switches the Defending Pokémon with 1 of his or her Benched Pokémon.
Flip a coin. If heads, prevent all effects of attacks, including damage, done to this Pokémon during your opponent's next turn.
Does 10 damage for each Energy attached to this Pokémon to one of your opponent's Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)
Flip 2 coins. This attack does 30 damage times the number of heads.
The Defending Pokémon is now Confused.
During your opponent's next turn, any damage done to this Pokémon by attacks is reduced by 20 (after applying Weakness and Resistance).
Attach an Energy card from your discard pile to this Pokémon.
Flip a coin. If tails, this Pokémon can't use Zap Cannon during your next turn.
Your opponent switches the Defending Pokémon with 1 of his or her Benched Pokémon.
This Pokémon can't use Sacred Sword during your next turn.
Flip a coin. If tails, this attack does nothing.
Look at the top 5 cards of your opponent's deck and put them back on top of his or her deck in any order.
Before doing damage, you may flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 60 more damage. If tails, this attack does nothing.
Flip a coin. If tails, this attack does nothing.
Attach an Energy card from your hand to 1 of your Pokémon.
Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 40 more damage. If tails, discard an Energy attached to the Defending Pokémon.
Flip a coin for each Energy attached to this Pokémon. This attack does 40 damage times the number of heads.
Heal 50 damage from 1 of your Pokémon.
Flip a coin. If tails, this attack does nothing.
Switch the Defending Pokémon with 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokémon.
The Defending Pokémon is now Asleep.
Flip a coin. If tails, this attack does nothing.
This Pokémon does 30 damage to itself.
Move an Energy from 1 of your Benched Pokémon to this Pokémon.
Move a basic Energy from this Pokémon to 1 of your Benched Pokémon.

carte.description: Draw cards until you have 6 cards in your hand.
Flip a coin. If heads, discard an Energy attached to 1 of your opponent's Pokémon.
Look at the top 7 cards of your deck. You may reveal a Pokémon you find there and put it into your hand. Shuffle the other cards back into your deck.
Heal all damage from 1 of your Pokémon. Then, discard all Energy attached to that Pokémon.
Switch your opponent's Active Pokémon with 1 of his or her Benched Pokémon.
Flip a coin. If heads, put a card from your discard pile on top of your deck.

attaque.description: Search your deck for a Lightning Energy card and attach it to this Pokémon. Shuffle your deck afterward.
Discard an Energy attached to this Pokémon.
Move an Energy from 1 of your Benched Pokémon to this Pokémon.
Move a basic Energy from this Pokémon to 1 of your Benched Pokémon.
